title: Welcome back after near-death experience :-)
content:
Ahhhh, Typophile is back! I thought it was something I said:-) I started seeing bright lights after a tunnel and my ancestors beckoning me!

ChrisL

 [‹ shadowplay](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422235854/http:/typophile.com/node/19946 "Go to previous forum topic") [A nice free font at Fontshop: Baskerville Old Face ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422235854/http:/typophile.com/node/19929 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content:
I thought I was the only one experiencing a fall out... I thought it might have something to do with the security patch for MAC OSX or a new flash patch causing havoc. Service seems to die late evening.

Mikey

No Mike, it happened to all of us:-)

ChrisL

It made me realize that in a very short time, I have become sort of addicted to Typophile.

I sort of knew how Pavlov’s dog or rat must have felt when Pavlov was screwing with their little brains, and they didn’t get the expected response when they clicked the link on their desktop.
Any Intel Mac should work after you remove Version Cue. Start the computer holding shift.
